agent_utterance: Today’s quick, low-effort plan: 1) drink 250 ml water now; 2) do a 1-minute box breathing (inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4); 3) rate your hunger on a 0–10 scale; 4) if hunger is 4 or higher, have a small, pre-planned bite (e.g., a handful of nuts or a piece of fruit) or the portion you planned; if hunger is 3 or lower, skip the bite and try a 2-minute cooling-off option (cold splash of water on the neck or a brief, easy stretch). You can adjust the bite quantity based on how you feel—flexibility is allowed.
